comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Fixed in SVN trunk. HttpClient can now make use of pluggable redirect handlers. Authentication handler is coming soon.

Also see HTTPCLIENT-245

Oleg

description:
Perhaps plugin handlers should be used to handle various ranges of http
responses.  Could be used to respond, auto-forward, resubmit ... Could solve the
difficulty in handling a 303 response.
